channel.title: [pi] kq spawns twice

item.title: [pi] kq spawns twice
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

lol you dont understand.

Kalphite queen is a uniqe case when the first kalphite queen spawns nad you kill it the second form spawns in its place

how you do this is instead of getting a regular dead emote you have a npc spawn for its death but the npc is spawning the same amount of people who try to attack it

what is really happening:

you kill land form of kalphite queen (set the death timer for like 500 (really high) and than the second form fly is spawned cause that is what you put for its death emote

but the problem is the death emote is spawn the same amount of people who try to attack it

in other words:

if you attack the second form to slowly the first form will spawn while your still attacking the fly form, but i have the respawn timer so slow that that shouldnt happen

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] kq spawns twice
item.dc:creator: @divinityms divinityms
item.description:
@divinityms wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:1, topic:402090”]pi if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158) {
Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, 1160, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1, 0, 0, 255, 31, 220, 330, true, true);
}

thats the code for the spawn i tried c2 also and one of the spawns says “you can not attack this npc it was not for you”

this happens when two people attack kq how can i fix this?[/quote]

spawn-config.cfg

Read full topic
